channel.title: Need help making a PS
channel.description: I'm confused and really need help, im learning programming and i really want to work on a server but i don't understand how the source + client stuff works, can someone please add me on skype or something and talk to me?

item.title: Need help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

You might want to head over to the General Programming section board if you want to learn more about programming. Everything skaterdude said was pretty much all I could say.

Gather basic knowledge of programming, find a nice server and learn on the job. Come back here when you feel stuck on a server related problem and somebody will hopefully help you out.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help making a PS
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Hi matie, this section is here to supply you with help. It seems you’ve mistaken it as a section to add people on skype.

If you could try and explain the problem you’re having a bit more, we will be able to help.

As you’re new to the programming world, I believe these links will help:
Java Tutorials by Oracle
Every tutorial by Oracle
Java API documentation
Eclipse IDE or One of the alternatives (People tend to favor IDEA’s now)
How to start a server

Read full topic
